Class SecurityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.unsw.security.SecurityService

  • @Path(value="/ExpertService")
public class SecurityService
extends java.lang.Object
    The java implementation of the Security Expert web service functions

public void setUpDatabase()

      • getAllExperts

        @GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllExperts()
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves all the security experts that are stored in the databases
        Returns:
        a list of all the security experts and their data in a JSON format
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

@Path(value="{expertID}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getExpertById(@PathParam(value="expertID")
                                                        int expertID)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the data of the security expert whose id was specified
        Parameters:
        expertID - the id of the expert needed
        Returns:
        The security experts data in JSON Format
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • searchExperts

        @GET
@Path(value="expertSearch")
@Consumes(value="text/plain")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response searchExperts(@DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="expertName")
                                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="email")
                                                                 java.lang.String email,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="education")
                                                                 java.lang.String education,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="nationality")
                                                                 java.lang.String nationality,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="experience")
                                                                 java.lang.String experience,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="")@QueryParam(value="skills")
                                                                 java.lang.String skills)
        A Search function to find all the experts which fit the needed criteria
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the expert
        email - the experts email
        education - the education which the expert has
        nationality - the nationality of the expert
        experience - past experience which the expert might have had
        skills - the skills which the expert has
        Returns:
        A list of all the security experts which fit the criteria

      • insertExpert

        @POST
@Consumes(value="application/json")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response insertExpert(Expert expert)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              java.net.URISyntaxException
        Create and insert an expert into the database
        Parameters:
        expert - The complete expert to be added into the database (this is automatically converted from the json representation when it is passed in)
        Returns:
        The location where the expert data can be retrieved from in the response header, and a string containing the experts id in the response body
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • updateExpertData

        @PUT
@Path(value="{expertID}")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateExpertData(@PathParam(value="expertID")
                                                                    int expertId,
                                                                    Expert updatedExpertData)
        Update an expert profile which is already in the database
        Parameters:
        expertId - the id of the expert to be created
        updatedExpertData - a bean of the expert containing the fields that need to be updated
        Returns:
        the data of the updated expert if expert exists

      • filterExperts

        @GET
@Path(value="expertFilter")
@Consumes(value="text/plain")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response filterExperts(@DefaultValue(value="0")@QueryParam(value="minRank")
                                                                 int minRank,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="-1")@QueryParam(value="maxRank")
                                                                 int maxRank,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="0")@QueryParam(value="minRep")
                                                                 int minRep,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="-1")@QueryParam(value="maxRep")
                                                                 int maxRep,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="0")@QueryParam(value="minQuality")
                                                                 float minQuality,
                                                                 @DefaultValue(value="-1")@QueryParam(value="maxQuality")
                                                                 float maxQuality)
        Filters the experts according to the parameter values
        Parameters:
        minRank - the minimum Rank on cobalt.io that the expert should have (i.e 1 for best rank)
        maxRank - the maximum Rank on cobalt.io that the expert should have
        minRep - the minimum reputation on cobalt.io that the expert should have
        maxRep - the maximum reputation on cobalt.io that the expert should have
        minQuality - the minimum report quality on cobalt.io that the expert should have
        maxQuality - the maximum report quality on cobalt.io that the expert should have
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all the security experts which match the filter criteria
